website_summaries.verdict: Most kids like these orange-flavored chewables, which have fairly consistent results on their digestive systems.
pros: Many kids like the taste of these chewables, and the tablets don’t stick to their teeth, according to parents
Generally good results in improving digestion and regularity
cons: Some parents say they don’t seem to work at all
Some kids don’t like the taste of the tablets

customer_reviews.title: She uses the adult version and has been extremely happy with them
customer_reviews.text: My wife swears by probiotics now and started giving these to my kids. She uses the adult version and has been extremely happy with them. While chewable, it's not a gummy, so expect kids needing a cup of water after. The taste is citrus like, thankfully for us our 6 year old who doesn't like many things is good with these. My oldest from what I have heard has been "processing nicely" So far, good!
customer_reviews.author: Kolinl79

customer_reviews.title: Helped toddler stool issues
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3-year-old has ongoing constipation issues from holding in her stool too long. We were giving her Miralax daily as per her pediatrician, and after the second week she broke out in a rash. Come to find out she has an allergy to PEG, which is pretty much all children's stool softeners/laxatives. I ended up needing to give her an enema on a few occasions which was traumatic for the both of us. In doing some research online I decided to try a probiotic in hopes that it would promote bowel regularity. This product has worked wonderfully for her, and she has no issues chewing one tablet up every day. Glad to have found this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Gamache

customer_reviews.title: works, I guess
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable! My kids (4 and 6) actually consume this! In fact, they routinely ask for more than one (no, no!). Does it work? How should I know? I'm sure not volunteering to take samples for my microscope. But they eat it and I guess they feel pretty good..? I dunno. They aren't worse off, so there's that. Besides, marketing unregulated probiotics for major $$ is a great way for all of us citizens and consumers to avoid focussing on the systematic causes of our suspected scant gut bacteria...
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Found moisture in individual packets
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these because they have some different strains that my children’s normal “smarty pants” probiotics don’t have. However there are MAJOR issues with the freshness. Half of my package has been spoiled, and is unusable. It seems to be a problem with how they were packaged at the factory because it they look nicely sealed up until you open it and find a smelly and moisture damaged pill. I would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: COAL

customer_reviews.title: Unsure of how to feel about this.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I liked it. My daughter developed loose stool after I have it to her. Not sure if that's normal.. **update** I thin she had a bug, and also I started following the instructions and giving it to her BEFORE she ate. It's been a good probiotic for her!
customer_reviews.author: Tee Watkins

customer_reviews.title: I've given the powders a try before but she likes this much more and I feel like they are more effective
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving these to my toddler religiously in combination with elderly syrup as well as vitamins and healthy eating everyday, and this year unlike last year she hasn't gotten sick even though she goes to day care. I've given the powders a try before but she likes this much more and I feel like they are more effective.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Boosting Immunity
customer_reviews.text: I started my boys on it before our Disneyland trip to boost their immune systems and kept them on it during the trip and for a week after and no one got sick! My boys like the taste and asked for them every morning and we're disappointed when we ran out! I am sure diligent hand washing along with these probiotics kept my boys healthy and happy what more can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Love, great taste!
customer_reviews.text: My sons love these and has helped with his digestion! Love that theres no added sugar and he says it taste great and there’s several different strands not just a lot of a few strands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for in a probiotic, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Really great product, but expensive. I bought these to give my kids during a long trip and have been very pleased. Before we started them, it was winter and the kids had one cold after another. We started these probiotics over a month ago and they have been healthy since. Due to the price, I probably won't be able to buy them for everyday use, but for travel, I absolutely will. I searched and searched for a shelf-stable, chewable multi-strain probiotic that also has prebiotics. This one has it all.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M Francis

customer_reviews.title: Multiple strains of probiotics was easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like that the product is safer for my son with his shellfish allergy and also like the fact it's in individual sealed foil per tablet. The product has several strains I bought it because my son took antibiotics and started having stomach issues. The product seems to help restore his good probiotic bacteria he has had less problems. The taste is ok not great but the small tablet size that he can swallow or chew helps. We have tried three other probiotics I saw the most benefit and fastest results from this. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Alessi/Kubinski Business Systems

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my children to take as an immune supplement during cold and midseason. They like the taste and look forward to taking it with their dinner. I switched from Kids Culturelle because this prohibitive has multiple strands of antibiotics. I would recommend this product and will be buying it again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves these! My almost 2 year old wouldn’t really give it a try but the packaging is simple to get just one pill out and my daughter looks forward to her probiotic. We didn’t have any gut issues just taking for extra gut and general health protection!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra M.

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old son loves these probiotics and asks ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son loves these probiotics and asks for them every morning. They keep him regular and he loves the taste. I l appreciate that they are nitrogen filled blister packs for freshness. Less likely for those strains to get damaged in shipping and storage. If he goes a day a two without them I can definitely notice a difference in his BM's. These will continue to be a regular in our household!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced and did not make a difference. Go with other brands like NOW or Culturelle. Save your money.

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure if the kids would like the taste of them

I wasn't sure if the kids would like the taste of them, but they really did! Usually they asked for more :) They're small, good tasting and have all the good stuff for their tummies. I would definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Graham

customer_reviews.title: I have loved this probiotic for my daughters
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this probiotic for my daughters, ages 3, 6, and 7, which they have been taking daily for about 9 months. They all take them willingly because they actually taste good. What's most important though, is that after taking it for a few weeks, they all seem to get colds and other illnesses much less often. That makes a huge difference in our lives!

Culterelle is fine, but it only has one bacteria.

product_meta.title: Naturo Sciences, Childrens Chewable Probiotic, Kids Digestive Immune Defense Probiotics, Nitrogen Filled Blister Packs for Product Freshness, 30 One a Day Tabs Sugar Free Orange Tangerine Flavor
feature_bullets: HAPPY TUMMIES: Probiotics can be a huge help when your little one has diarrhea or other tummy upsets, including those associated with the use of antibiotics. Naturo Sciences Kids Chewable Probiotic helps restore the natural balance in your child’s digestive tract, which is crucial to helping him or her get over painful tummy troubles.

HEALTHY DIGESTIVE & IMMUNE SYSTEMS: We all want to keep our children strong and healthy, and the key probiotics in this kid-friendly formula can be a great immune-system-booster… helping to maintain a healthy balance of good bacteria in the gut, keeping your child’s digestive system happy and supporting a healthy immune function.

KIDS LOVE THE GREAT TASTE: Easy to chew. Sugar free. Drama free… and kids love the great natural tangerine flavor of Naturo Sciences Kids Chewable Probiotics. Have an especially picky little eater? This once-a-day chewable can be easily hidden in snacks or crushed and mixed with cold foods.

PARENTS LOVE THE EFFECTIVENESS: Naturo Sciences Kids Chewable Probiotics contain 8 kid-friendly probiotic strains with 5 billion live cultures. And to ensure the delivery of active probiotics to their target, Naturo Sciences Kids Chewable Probiotics come in distinctive blister foil packs that use a special form of dry nitrogen for guaranteed fresh cultures!
Kids Chewable Probiotic Supplement; 30 Probiotic Chewables for Children in Dry Nitrogen Flushed Blister Packs, Guaranteed Live Cultures, 30 Count, Once Daily, Sugar Free, Natural Tangerine Flavor
